propositions.text: Sea Demon as a central theme in literature
Introduction to the author Nuwa and her literary style
Cultural and historical background of the Sea Demon legend
Themes and stylistic elements in Nuwa's works
Encounter at the seaside with a mysterious sea cat
Legends and myths surrounding the Sea Demon
Revelation of the Sea Demon's true nature
Main characters and their symbolic roles
Exploration of human-nature relationship and other themes
Conclusion and future outlook of 'Sea Demon'
Potential for future works and adaptations

concepts.context: Central mythical figure representing fear and desire

concepts.context: Author with a focus on fantasy and human nature

concepts.name: Human-Nature Relationship

hierarchy.structure: The document is organized into four main chapters: author introduction and background, story narrative, character and thematic analysis, and conclusion with future outlook.
